full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKYES BU GSUM GYI LAM GYI RIM PA'I CHOS SKYONG RNAMS LA GTOR MA 'BUL TE 'PHRIN LAS BCOL TSUL DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGA' LDAN RAB RGYAS GLING DU, BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I CHO GA BDZUGS RGYUR` SKYES BU GSUM GYI CHOS SKYONG LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL TE 'PHRIN LAS BCOL TSUL DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'KHRUL BRAL BSHES GNYEN DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG LA GZHI BYAS TE GYI NA BA ZHIG GIS BRIS, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
